TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 444
TEI.2.document_title: Jesse Woodbury to Stephen F Austin, 07-08-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Jesse Woodbury to Austin, July 8, 1830. Receipt for $14 with which to buy books. Report on the commission.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 444

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Jesse Woodbury to Austin, July 8, 1830. Receipt for $14 with which to buy books. Report on the commission.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Sn Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="07-08-1830">8th July 1830*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Recd of *person_mentioned*Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* fourteen Dollars handed me by him for the purpose of my purchasing for him in *location_mentioned*New York*/location_mentioned* some Books as per Memorandum given Me by sd *person_mentioned*Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Jesse Woodbury*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J. WoodBury Jr*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Bot of *person_mentioned*Collins and Hanney*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*No. 230 Pearl Street*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p*1 Webbters Dictionary—----$2.00*/p*
*p*2 Spanish and English do------$4.00*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-27-1831">January 27th 1831.*/date_mentioned* Recd Peyt-----$3.00*/p*
*p*The orthography of The Spanish academy of Madrid Could not be found Through The *location_mentioned*City*/location_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*J W Jr*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
